summary: This appears to be an email forwarding an inmate personal property record for Jeffrey Epstein dated July 15, 2019, from an Associate Warden in New York. The document is likely related to the inventory of Epstein's property following his arrest and incarceration.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the inmate personal property record being forwarded via email.

events.title: Inmate Property Record Created
events.description: An inmate personal property record for Jeffrey Epstein is created, likely documenting items in his possession while incarcerated.

keyFacts: An inmate personal property record for Jeffrey Epstein was created on July 15, 2019.
The record was forwarded via email by an Associate Warden in New York.
The document is part of the administrative process following Epstein's arrest and incarceration.
